user.title: Setup Auto Off Timer
user.description: Configure entities to automatically turn off after a specified timeout when they turn on.

data.name: Name for this Auto Off Timer configuration
data.entities: Select entities that should automatically turn off after the timeout
data.timeout: How long to wait before turning off the entities
data.enable_template: Optional template condition that must be true for the timer to activate

data_description.name: Name for this Auto Off Timer configuration
data_description.entities: Select entities that should automatically turn off after the timeout
data_description.timeout: How long to wait before turning off the entities
data_description.enable_template: Optional template condition that must be true for the timer to activate

error.entities_required: At least one entity must be selected
error.timeout_required: Timeout duration must be greater than 0
error.invalid_entities: These entities don't support the turn_off service: {entities_list}
